scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn codegen:mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ alephao/Genzee --network mainnet
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn codegen:rinkeby && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ alephao/Genzee-Rinkeby --network rinkeby
scripts.deploy:local: yarn codegen:local && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 alephao/Genzee --network local
